title: Now

Now

Hello! This is my now page where I keep a brief record of what I am up to these days.

As of 03 Jan 2026, I am:

  • Studying the book Algebraic Graph Theory by Godsil and Royle.
  • Learning about the Coxeter graph and Tutte's 8-cage.
  • Learning about distance-transitive graphs, in general.
  • Maintaining this website.
  • Occasionally posting comments to Hacker News (see here).
